sentences.en: He hold on to my arm with a tenacious grip.
sentences.cn: 他紧紧抓住我的手臂不放.

sentences.en: He is a tenacious world master.
sentences.cn: 他是个顽强的世界主人.

sentences.en: He was a tenacious beast . On the very ladder he lingered.
sentences.cn: 他这死不甘心的家伙, 在舷梯上踌躇不前了.

sentences.en: I can affirm that he is tenacious and pertinacious as are few.
sentences.cn: 我可以肯定,像他那样不屈不挠、百折不回的人是十分罕见的.

sentences.en: I like the butterfly orchid, Phalaenopsis like tenacious and selfless dedication.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢蝴蝶兰, 喜欢蝴蝶兰的顽强和无私奉献的精神.

sentences.en: Is tenacious we should cherish it and grass, it has strong vitality!
sentences.cn: 是顽强的我们应该好好珍惜它,小草, 它有顽强的生命力!

sentences.en: Its inhabitants , by nature acquisitive and cautious, economical, tenacious, had learnt to worship the word'smart ".
sentences.cn: 它的成员, 尽管天性贪婪,谨慎, 节俭, 坚韧, 却学会了崇拜 “ 时髦 ” 这两个字.

sentences.en: Learns sensitively thinks , by its knowledge, mettle, tenacious Cheng Qiming.
sentences.cn: 敏学好思, 以其学识 、 胆略 、 坚韧成其名.

sentences.en: She is very tenacious and will work hard and long to achieve objectives.
sentences.cn: 她是个锲而不舍的人，为了达到目标愿意长期苦干。

sentences.en: She's a tenacious woman. She never gives up.
sentences.cn: 她是个坚毅的人，从不放弃。
人的愚昧可笑实在根深蒂固.

sentences.en: The eagle seized its prey in a tenacious grip.
The snake is tenacious of life.
There is no denying that they played well, very tenacious.
sentences.cn: 不可否认,他们打得很好, 很顽强.

words.tran_cn: 韧性；固执；不屈不挠；黏性

trans.tran_cn: 顽强的，黏着力强的，坚决的，（记忆力）持久的
trans.tran_en: determined to do something and unwilling to stop trying even when the situation becomes difficult
